About Me

whoami

I am a student of Computer Science and Engineering at Techno International Newtown, Kolkata. I am currently in 3rd Year. I am always learning new skills and building new stuff.

my interests

I am interested in learning new technologies which include Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Cyber Security.

I am also quite fond of Linux.

why hire me ?

I am a hardworking person.

 ); } } export default About;
